ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Sushmita Sahu has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 9 years. During her last employment she was working as a Product Manager/Tech at PwC. Sushmita has extensive knowledge of Microsoft Excel, Java, Ascential DataStage, Visual Basic, Spring Framework, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, Lua, JavaScript, ETL, adobe, XSLT, XML, Struts Web Application Framework, Service Oriented Architecture, Perl Programming, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle, Microsoft PowerPoint, Java Server Pages, IBM WebSphere, Hibernate, HTML, Enterprise Java Beans, Eagle STAR Financial Software, ECLiPSe, Cascading Style Sheets, BlackBerry, Android. Sushmita has a considerable management experience (2.8 years) with exposure to executive/middle management positions.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2013-12 for 7 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Product Manager/Tech/architect at PwC. Since 2013-10 for 3 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Project Manager/architect at PwC. Since 2012-11 for 10 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Project Manager/architect at PwC. Since 2012-09 for 2 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Project Manager/architect at PwC. Since 2011-06 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Product Manager/architect at FDA.
